day_row.base: w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded-lg border transition-colors hover:bg-neutral-800/50

month_header.container: sticky top-16 z-10 bg-neutral-950/95 backdrop-blur-sm py-2 mb-2 border-b border-neutral-800
month_header.title: text-2xl font-semibold text-neutral-100

month_index.container: hidden md:block sticky top-0 h-[calc(100vh-120px)] w-12 flex-shrink-0
month_index.button: px-2 py-1 text-xs rounded hover:bg-neutral-800 transition-colors text-neutral-400 hover:text-neutral-100

detail_pane.mobile_sheet: lg:hidden fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-end
detail_pane.mobile_content: relative w-full max-h-[80vh] bg-neutral-900 rounded-t-2xl border-t border-neutral-800 overflow-auto
detail_pane.header: sticky top-0 bg-neutral-900 border-b border-neutral-800 p-4 flex items-center justify-between

form.label: block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-300 mb-1
form.input: w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-lg bg-neutral-900 border-neutral-800 text-neutral-100
form.textarea: w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-lg bg-neutral-900 border-neutral-800 text-neutral-100 min-h-[80px] resize-y
form.select: w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-lg bg-neutral-900 border-neutral-800 text-neutral-100

layout.header: sticky top-0 z-20 bg-neutral-950 pb-4 mb-4 border-b border-neutral-800
